name: Web3 Security Frameworks
description: Establishing best practices and security protocols for decentralized applications.

cards.title: Secure Smart Contract Development
cards.description: Implementing best practices to reduce security risks in Solidity.
cards.bulletpoints: Code audits, linting, security-focused contract patterns
cards.summaryText: Reinforce disciplined code reviews, automated linting, and battle-tested security patterns to harden Solidity deliverables.

cards.title: Web3 Security Incident Response
cards.description: Handling security breaches and contract vulnerabilities.
cards.bulletpoints: Bug bounty programs, on-chain monitoring, emergency pause mechanisms
cards.summaryText: Outline playbooks that combine bug bounties, real-time monitoring, and pause switches to contain on-chain incidents.

cards.title: Zero-Trust & Decentralized Security
cards.description: Implementing decentralized security principles in Web3 architecture.
cards.bulletpoints: Multisig wallets, hardware security modules, decentralized key management
cards.summaryText: Connect zero-trust philosophy with multisig custody, HSM usage, and resilient decentralized key management flows.
